Reviews.Title: “Cheap, clean, well-located "pensione" with free high-speed internet”
Reviews.Author: sbabones
Reviews.Content: title cortina beautiful excellent value money service unenthusiastic dont speak english bedding surprisingly free hotel wireless truly highspeed ive found citycenter business class hotel location strasse charlottenburg perfect sbahn berlin elevated metro corner neighborhood restaurants ethnicity fruit store supermarket block exit hotel street short hotel fabulous deal hotel people stairs issue carry bags flights stairs reception desk 24 hour shared courtyard stay people neighboring building sat outside talking till 3 am saturday night relatively minor considering price range hotel bugs dirt plumbing etc overall satisfied stay
